characters.name: Paul Atreides
characters.description: Last Duke of House Atreides, leader of the Fremen, and first ruler of the Atreides Empire

characters.name: Chani Kynes
characters.description: Chani Kynes, also known by her intimate name Sihaya, was the Fremen bound concubine of Emperor Paul Atreides.

characters.name: Jessica Atreides
characters.description: Official concubine of Duke Leto Atreides I, and the mother of his son, Emperor Paul Atreides, and daughter, Alia Atreides. She was also a Reverend Mother of the Bene Gesserit Sisterhood

characters.name: Leto Atreides I
characters.description: Sometimes called Leto the Just or the Red Duke, was the twentieth duke of House Atreides fathered Emperor Paul Atreides and Regent Alia Atreides with Bene Gesserit concubine, Lady Jessica

characters.name: Gurney Halleck
characters.description: Warmaster for House Atreides during the reign of Leto Atreides I, and then his son Paul.

characters.name: Thufir Hawat
characters.description: Mentat and Master of Assassins for House Atreides during the time of Duke Leto the Just.

characters.name: Stilgar
characters.description: Full name Stilgar Ben Fifrawi, was the Naib, or leader of Sietch Tabr, a Fremen tribe of Arrakis during the Atreides Fiefdom.

characters.name: Vladimir Harkonnen
characters.description: Penultimate ruler of House Harkonnen, and the chief architect in the demise of Duke Leto Atreides of House Atreides during the latter part of the reign of Shaddam IV.

characters.name: Glossu Rabban Harkonnen
characters.description: Also known as the Beast, Mudir Nahya (Demon Ruler), and King Cobra by the Fremen, was the older nephew of Baron Vladimir Harkonnen, and the Count of Lankiveil.

characters.name: Gaius Helen Mohiam
characters.description: Bene Gesserit Reverend Mother, who was secretly the mother of Jessica Atreides, and the grandmother of Paul Atreides.
